name: Color by number by Israel Cascante
name_original: Color by number by Israel Cascante
description:
Este videojuego fue hecho por Israel Cascante

Instructions: 

Draw picture what you want. You can change color and erase with white square.

White square down is eraser. 

C or clear button-clear all

 w,a,s,d-move camera

 Q+w,a,s,d-move picture

 left/right arrow-move colors from below.

 X-change style.

 N-next music.

 P-pause music.

 R-resume music.

 O-on/off sounds. 

Press done, when you finish. 

Name your picture. 

2) Paint out:

 Now you can paint out this picture or other picture. When you click paint out, write number of element of picture or picture id, that you want to paint out(there is also your picture). 

When you finish, wait near 5 seconds and you go to menu.
